commit message: Change base url to arubanet server

CRASHFIX: Fixed foolish 'CRASH' due to long chaining

* When one of those outputs is null the app crashes
* Happens every 30 seconds on Micromax devices
* Never chain such long function calls without being sure about nullablity

BUGFIX: Supplicant return only unicoded ssid with quotes

* Hence no notification on devices that couldn't desipher unicoded ssids

FEATURE: Login as soon as connected to WiFi

* Since we're asking for the WiFi State permission, let's utilize it best.
Login only when properly connected to the network

Don't stop service since we can assist in Login

We used to stop service to save CPU when it was not possible to show
notification on lower APIs
Increase version number for new bugfix release
BUGFIX: Old missed null pointer exceptions
Save the username after database changes in Preferences for future use by Service
